text: tatha un logon[1] ke lie (bhee), jinhonne aavaas bana liya is ghar (madeena) ko tatha un (muhaajiron ke aane) se pahale eemaan laaye, ve prem karate hain unase, jo hijarat karake aa gaye unake yahaan aur ve nahin paate apane dilon mein koee aavashyakta usakee, jo unhen diya jaaye aur praathamikta dete hain doosaron ko apane oopar, chaahe svayan bhookhe[1] hon aur jo bacha liye gaye apane man kee tangee se, to vahee saphal hone vaale hain
